long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Amazon Sponsored Content Dimmer

## Short Description:
Enhance your Amazon shopping experience by dimming sponsored content, making organic search results stand out naturally.

## Detailed Description:
Make your Amazon shopping experience clearer and more transparent! This lightweight extension helps you easily distinguish between organic and sponsored content while shopping.

‚ú® KEY FEATURES:
- Automatically identifies and gently dims sponsored products
- Simply hover over dimmed items to see them clearly
- Zero impact on page loading speed
- Privacy focused - works entirely on your device

üéØ PERFECT FOR:
- Shoppers who want to focus on organic search results
- Users who prefer a cleaner shopping interface
- Anyone who wants to make informed purchasing decisions

üí° HOW IT WORKS:
1. Install the extension
2. Visit Amazon
3. Sponsored content will automatically appear dimmed
4. Hover over any dimmed content to view it clearly
5. Enjoy a cleaner shopping experience!

üîí PRIVACY & SECURITY:
- No data collection or tracking
- Works completely offline
- No personal information accessed
- Open source for transparency

üé® DESIGN:
- Minimal visual interference
- Maintains full site functionality
- Smooth visual transitions
- Professional appearance

üìù SUPPORT & UPDATES:
- Regular updates for compatibility
- Enhanced detection accuracy
- Improved performance
- Contact developer for assistance
